name: Partivity!
summary:
Description
Partivity is a classic party game played by 2–6 teams where you try to guess as many words as you can in one minute. Every round has 5 difficulties; starting with “baby” difficulty all the way to “nightmare”. The amount of points earned for each successful guess depends on the selected activity – describing, drawing, or pantomime.

For example, describing is the easiest one, so for each successful guess you will get only one point. However, in the case of pantomime you get three points per word. Each round, you can pick which activity to do. You can decide to play it safe and choose to describe all the time, though if your opponents ace the harder activities, they will most likely beat you.

You can keep up with your current standing by checking team scores depicted as cute progress bars with each team’s color at the bottom of the screen. They show which team is closer to earning fifty points and winning the game. To see who is the reigning Partivity champion among your friends, you can check out the previous games section for the history of all played games along with each game’s winner. If you are up to the task of snatching their champion title, just tap the rematch button and the game is on.

Features
Play in two to six teams with as many people as you like.
Pause the game just by closing the app and continue whenever you feel like it.
Recreate teams from previous games to beat the last winner. Increasing difficulty with each successful guess.
Team scores visible at a glance with cute progress bars.
6 supported languages: English, Spanish, Chinese (simplified), Japanese, Czech and Slovak.
